highlights: Knowledge Dock can now discover entries from other projects, apply category filters, and import in bulk.

title: Template experience refresh
highlights: Template cards display summaries directly on the cover and show one-tap Quick Start.
Category filters reflect only the genres in your library, and locked templates call out the required tier.
Recent templates promote the most-used configuration at the top of the grid.

highlights: Generation/continuation usage is now synced with the backend so monthly counters stay accurate.
Pricing includes structured data (JSON-LD) for better visibility on search engines.

title: Workspace onboarding
